extendedInfo.description: A live wallpaper featuring a range of snowy, frosty and wintry scenes with realistic snow falling in front of them. Christmas may be over but it's still snowing! Includes instructions on how to configure live wallpapers.You can also save the backgrounds to SD card so you can use them as non-live wallpapers if you wish.The photographs used were mostly taken in the English town of Royal Leamington Spa. We've been snowed in this weekend so I had a chance to take some new photos!

reviews.comment: Really beautiful, but I don\'t buy lwp which uses huge memory space unless it is Earth shattering experience. But this one can be stored in SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lovely app. Multiple background scenes to chose from & ability to chose amount of snow & directional flurries in foreground. Is a bit of a battery hog
